title: Creativity and the Human Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/14/17
itunes:title: Creativity and the Human Brain - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 11/14/17
description:
George Noory and guests Dr. David Eagleman and Anthony Brandt explore what makes the human race the most creative species on the planet, and how the brain will help solve the problems facing the Earth in the future.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
